RESPONSE TEXT: I'm ashamed of myself. There's no other way to say it.
I'll do whatever it takes to earn back my family's trust.
If it wasn't for you, things could have been a lot worse.
Can't believe what a damn fool I've been.
From now on, I'm going to help people.
I've got a lot to atone for, but I'll find a way to make things right.
